entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -0.5°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
